title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Clearing up a lingering misunderstanding is your top priority today. Sidestep your ego and all the indignant emotions that it could churn up to validate any posturing. The funny thing is it wont ultimately matter who is right or wrong now. Your heart may be singing a different song very soon. Taking responsibility for your part in the current situation opens the door to reconciliation. Mystic poet Rumi wrote, Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and right-doing there is a field. Ill meet you there. When the soul lies down in that grass, the world is too full to talk about. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
